description: This file defines the DeliveryFragment class, a UI component in an Android application responsible for displaying delivery tracking information, handling user interactions, and updating delivery status visuals based on the associated ViewModel and data repository.

classes.name: DeliveryFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that manages the delivery tracking UI, displaying order status, ETA, and timeline, and handling user actions such as order cancellation.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, setting up the shared ViewModel and adapter.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up event listeners, and observes ViewModel LiveData to update UI accordingly.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Updates UI elements based on the current delivery order, its status, ETA, and progress.

methods.name: buildTimelineRows
methods.description: Constructs a list of timeline row data objects representing each delivery stage with timestamps and status.

methods.name: formatCountdown
methods.description: Formats a countdown timer string from seconds.
